QuestData.Title: Sashj'tar Slayer
QuestData.Description: I cannot believe that Throndyr is gone.$B$BBy the horns on my head, we shall have revenge for all of the pain that the Sashj'tar have inflicted on us!$B$BPress forward, $n. Kill them! Kill them all!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Sashj'tar naga in Azuregale Cove.
